description:
The truth about Jurika has been revealed, and Sae has vowed to never use magic again. But Jurika won’t let her go – he’s locked her away in a place no one can reach. Takeo and the others have to find her, before she’s lost forever!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sae no Mahou, Sae no Kimochi, Itsumademo Zutto
沙絵の魔法, 沙絵の気持ち, いつまでもずっと
